entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 9:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
